Interface NeuralNet

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IActorCritic, IDQN
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorCriticCompGraph, ActorCriticSeparate, DQN

        void applyGradient(org.deeplearning4j.nn.gradient.Gradient[] gradients,
                   int batchSize)
        update the params from the gradients and the batchSize
        Parameters:
        gradients - gradients to apply the gradient from
        batchSize - batchSize from which the gradient was calculated on (similar to nstep)
